ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contain ICD-10CM codes for Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS) scores for traumatic and moderate brain injuries.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to use the GCS to identify patients with severe neurological impairment, a contraindication for treating patients with ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI). The GCS classification of scores 3 to 8 and 9 to 12 indicate traumatic and moderate brain injuries.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include GCS scores of 3-8 and 9-12 in the field (EMT or ambulance), at arrival to ED, at hospital admission, 24 or more hours after hospital admission, and unspecified time.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
